inputs.selection_motivation: Gold price is a global safe‑haven asset with a weaker, indirect link to the USD/CNY pair compared to other drivers, making it the least critical for the new US services PMI influence.

prioritized_link.motivation: US Services PMI is a leading indicator of US economic strength; a robust PMI signals a stronger USD relative to the CNY, directly influencing the USD/CNY rate.
